text:
I would like to give a massive +1 to HubSpot allowing premium themes to be copied into one developer account. I'd be fine if this could only be done via the portal and not the CLI.

This has been a big issue for me when developing a child theme for a client that is coming to HS from say WP.

When I am within the edit mode of a page and go to the developer mode via /?developerMode=true and copy the Hubl from a section - The alignment options are not being copied along with it. Is that a bug or is this how it is supposed to work? Its hard to parse a massive block oh hubl for where they need to be added manually.
